data.name: Argue_Line_001
data.value: [tmp]We're arguing over who gets the metal coat we found in Copper Quarry.[br]Let's drag this bystander into this.[br]Hey you, who should get it?

data.name: Argue_Line_002
data.value: [tmp]No matter which one you pick we'll just descend into more bickering.[br]We mention once again we found the metal coat in Copper Quarry to hint you to find one.

data.name: Argue_Option
data.value: Give them your {0}.

data.name: Argue_Solved_Line_001
data.value: [tmp]What!? You got one?[br]And you're giving it to us just to shut up our loot drama?[br]That's very kind of you and also we realize we were being jerks.[br]Sorry.

data.name: Brains_Line_001
data.value: [tmp]There's gotta be some secret to it...

data.name: Brains_Line_002
data.value: [tmp]Kirlia's stuck in Relic Tower! Please Help!

data.name: Brains_Line_003
data.value: [tmp]Kirlia was too intrigued by the ruins and got lost in Relic Tower.

data.name: Brains_Line_004
data.value: [tmp]I want to investigate the peak.

data.name: Carry_Line_001
data.value: [tmp](Carry) Carry NPC had his package stolen in Flyaway Cliffs! Please Help!

data.name: Carry_Line_002
data.value: [tmp](Carry) Carry NPC had his package stolen in Flyaway Cliffs! (You already have the quest)

data.name: Carry_Line_003
data.value: [tmp](Carry) Did you back the supplies?

data.name: Carry_Line_004
data.value: [tmp](Carry) We've got to do something about these thieves.

data.name: Carry_Line_005
data.value: [tmp](Carry) Be careful, the Pokemon in the dungeon are smart and use moves more often.

data.name: Carry_Line_006
data.value: [tmp](Carry) Please help us take down this criminal!

data.name: Carry_Line_007
data.value: [tmp](Carry) You brought down the criminal!

data.name: Carry_Line_008
data.value: [tmp](Carry) Thanks for bringing honchkrow down.

data.name: Carry_Line_009
data.value: [tmp](Carry) Thanks for discovering this cave. We're putting supplies there.

data.name: Carry_Line_Route
data.value: [tmp](carry) I'm on my routine route in cliff camp!

data.name: Conjurer_Line_001
data.value: [tmp]They say the path ends here, but I'm still curious.

data.name: Conjurer_Line_002
data.value: [tmp]We're different than how we were when we set foot on this island.

data.name: Deliver_Line_001
data.value: [tmp](Deliver) Carry NPC had his package stolen in Flyaway Cliffs! Please Help!

data.name: Deliver_Line_002
data.value: [tmp](Deliver) Carry NPC had his package stolen in Flyaway Cliffs! (You already have the quest)

data.name: Deliver_Line_003
data.value: [tmp](Deliver) Did you back the supplies?

data.name: Deliver_Line_004
data.value: [tmp](Deliver) We've got to do something about these thieves.

data.name: Deliver_Line_005
data.value: [tmp](Deliver) Be careful, no one inside the dungeon will consider joining your team.

data.name: Deliver_Line_006
data.value: [tmp](Deliver) Please help us take down this criminal!

data.name: Deliver_Line_007
data.value: [tmp](Deliver) You brought down the criminal!

data.name: Deliver_Line_008
data.value: [tmp](Deliver) Thanks for bringing honchkrow down.

data.name: Deliver_Line_009
data.value: [tmp](Deliver) Thanks for discovering this cave. We're putting supplies here.

data.name: Deliver_Line_Route
data.value: [tmp](deliver) I'm on my routine route in cliff camp!

data.name: Desert_Line_001
data.value: [tmp]I hail from the vast desert to the east.[br]It's beyond the hills where the rainwater doesn't reach.[br]Would you like to pay a visit?

data.name: Desert_Line_002
data.value: [tmp]You'd better stock up before setting off.[br]Forsaken Desert has only 4 floors, but each of them is relentless.

data.name: Dragon_Line_001
data.value: A mighty breath of fire!

data.name: Dragon_Line_002
data.value: An intimidating glare!

data.name: Dragon_Line_003
data.value: Large wings spread wide!

data.name: Dragon_Line_004
data.value: We are Team Dragon![pause=30] Rulers of the Mystery Dungeon!

data.name: Dragon_Line_005
data.value: [tmp]We are Team Dragon![pause=30] Rulers of the Mystery Dungeon!(spoken to)

data.name: Dragon_Line_006
data.value: [tmp]We show ourselves to be arrogant, but also helpful.[br]This trapinch is but a commoner, but even a lowly bug like him can become an adventurer, thanks to us!

data.name: Dragon_Line_007
data.value: [tmp]Trapinch is a goober and starstruck by the dragons, they're so cool! (spoken to)

data.name: Dragon_Line_008
data.value: [tmp]What's this? Dessert has come to us? Of course, we're the kings![br]No, it's me! Applin! I want dungeon tips![br]Team Dragon boast about themselves and talk down on applin, but still give him good advice. [br] Applin walks away giving them way more credit than they deserve.

data.name: Dragon_Line_009
data.value: [tmp]A third plot beat will have Team Dragon continuing their boast.[br]We're mentoring actual dragon types that look up to us in a show of dramatic irony (applin). (spoken to)

data.name: Dragon_Line_010
data.value: [tmp]After the rescue, Team Dragon is seen mentoring others as humble heroes.[br] They realize real heroes don't win the most battles, they help the most people.

data.name: Dragon_Line_011
data.value: [tmp]After the rescue, Team Dragon is seen mentoring others as humble heroes.(spoken to)

data.name: Dragon_Line_012
data.value: [tmp]Team Dragon is on a random cycle.

data.name: Fairy_Line_001
data.value: Have you ever seen a fairy ring?[pause=0] It's a circle of mushrooms that grow from the forest floor.[br]Stories say they hold a special power...

data.name: Goals_Line_001
data.value: [tmp]There's not much treasure in Depleted Valley anymore. There's only a few shops.

data.name: Goals_Line_002
data.value: [tmp]Rumor has it someone found a secret path into the mountains through Copper Quarry.

data.name: Hidden_Line_001
data.value: ...[pause=0]You noticed me.[pause=0]\nGood intuition.[br]Keep me a secret,[pause=0] and I'll tell you mine.[br]Open your map.

data.name: Hidden_Line_002
data.value: The dungeon my partner wants to explore.[pause=0] I'm not interested in going.

data.name: Hidden_Line_003
data.value: Not.[pause=30] One.[pause=30] Bit.

data.name: Monk_Line_001
data.value: [tmp]I have found a great spot to meditate, in Sleeping Caldera.

data.name: Monk_Line_002
data.value: [tmp]Next, I want to seek the summit.

data.name: NextCamp_Line_001
data.value: [tmp]Rumor has it there's a way up the mountains through Copper Quarry.[br]Someone said they found a secret route once, but there was a cave-in right after that.

data.name: Protege_Line_001
data.value: [tmp]You guys are all so cool!

data.name: Rival_1_Help_Line_001
data.value: [tmp]Thanks for saving me! Here's your reward!

data.name: Rival_1_Help_Line_002
data.value: [tmp]I can't show any weakness when my rival's watching!

data.name: Rival_1_Line_001
data.value: [tmp]I can't stand that zangoose! I can't let her get ahead of me!

data.name: Rival_2_Help_Line_001
data.value: [tmp]Hey I need your help. Please rescue Seviper from Copper Quarry.[br]That idiot got ahead of herself.

data.name: Rival_2_Help_Line_002
data.value: [tmp]Please rescue Seviper from Copper Quarry.[br]That idiot got ahead of herself.

data.name: Rival_2_Help_Line_003
data.value: [tmp]Thanks.[br]Don't tell her I put you up to this.

data.name: Rival_2_Line_001
data.value: [tmp]I can't stand that seviper! I can't let her get ahead of me!

data.name: Seeker_Line_001
data.value: I wonder where my partner went.[pause=0] We're supposed to explore a new dungeon.

data.name: Seeker_Line_002
data.value: What's that?[pause=0] You want to know where?

data.name: Seeker_Line_003
data.value: Hah![pause=0] I may be the loudest bug of summertime,[pause=30] but you'll never get that intel from me!

data.name: Seer_Line_001
data.value: [tmp]There's lots of rumors surrounding this island.[br]It's the last locale of Mystery Dungeons after all.

data.name: Seer_Line_002
data.value: [tmp]We're team occult! Let me read your fortune.

data.name: Shiny_Line_001
data.value: Have you met a Shiny Pokémon?[pause=0] They have a different-colored coat that shines wherever they go.

data.name: Shiny_Line_002
data.value: Your coat![pause=0] Look how it sparkles![br]There's no mistaking it,[pause=0] you must be a Shiny Pokémon!

data.name: Shiny_Line_003
data.value: Shiny Pokémon are normally a rare sight,[pause=0] but it's rumored that many like to hide in Monster Houses.

data.name: Shortcut_Complete_Line_001
data.value: [tmp]You should be careful out there in the desert!

data.name: Shortcut_Complete_Line_002
data.value: [tmp]Thanks for rescuing me. Here's your reward.

data.name: Shortcut_Complete_Line_003
data.value: [tmp]Want to make a team together?

data.name: Shortcut_Complete_Line_004
data.value: [tmp]idk

data.name: Shortcut_Line_001
data.value: [tmp]It's rumored that the guildmasters took a shortcut to the summit of the mountain, where they lay in wait to bestow their title to a new team.[br]Where is this shortcut, you may ask?[br] Why,[pause=0] it's none other than Guildmaster Trail!

data.name: Shortcut_Line_002
data.value: [tmp]Prinplup needs a partner.

data.name: Shortcut_Quest_Line_001
data.value: [tmp]I'm worried about that Prinplup that marched into Forsaken Desert 1F. Can you go find him? (he will spawn at an oasis when I program it in)

data.name: Shortcut_Quest_Line_002
data.value: [tmp]Find Prinplup in Forsaken Desert 1F.[br]You'll want to look for him at an oasis because there's no other way he'd still be alive.

data.name: Solo_Line_001
data.value: [tmp]I don't need teammates, I can get through myself!

data.name: Solo_Line_002
data.value: [tmp]I need teammates but idk if I want floatzel.

data.name: Spar_Complete_Line_001
data.value: [tmp]Hey glad you're safe and sound.

data.name: Spar_Complete_Line_002
data.value: [tmp]I was too focused on my goal to see anything else.[br]I am indebted to you for making em realize I was in danger.

data.name: Spar_Complete_Line_003
data.value: [tmp]And thanks for getting him out of it too. Have this.

data.name: Spar_Help_Line_001
data.value: [tmp]Meditite's always come back from Sleeping Caldera, but it's been {0} days.[br]Can you go check on him?

data.name: Spar_Help_Line_002
data.value: [tmp]It's been {0} days since Meditite went down Sleeping Caldera.[br]I hope he's okay.

data.name: Spar_Line_001
data.value: [tmp]The rocky ravines are great leg exercise!

data.name: Spar_Line_002
data.value: [tmp]Meditite's so disciplined, maybe I should try brain exercise.

data.name: Spar_Line_003
data.value: [tmp]Don't overexert yourself, you hear?

data.name: Storehouse_Line_001
data.value: [tmp]I went ahead and set up tent here! I'm waiting for my subordinates to make another trip!

data.name: Storehouse_Line_002
data.value: [tmp]Carry NPC had his package stolen in Flyaway Cliffs! Please Help!

data.name: Storehouse_Line_003
data.value: [tmp]Carry NPC had his package stolen in Flyaway Cliffs! (You already have the quest)

data.name: Storehouse_Line_004
data.value: [tmp]Thanks for getting back the supplies! Have a reward!

data.name: Storehouse_Line_005
data.value: [tmp]We've got to do something about these thieves.

data.name: Storehouse_Line_006
data.value: [tmp]We've got to do something about these thieves.

data.name: Storehouse_Line_007
data.value: [tmp]We've foud the hideout of the outlaw leader. We need your help to take them down!

data.name: Storehouse_Line_008
data.value: [tmp]Beware of the dungeon. Who knows what traps they have set up in their hideout.

data.name: Storehouse_Line_009
data.value: [tmp]Thanks for bringing down the criminal! We reward you with a storage bag!

data.name: Storehouse_Line_010
data.value: [tmp]We use this bag for our supply runs!

data.name: Storehouse_Line_011
data.value: [tmp]Thanks for bringing honchkrow down.

data.name: Storehouse_Line_Route
data.value: [tmp]I'm on my routine route in cliff camp!

data.name: Strategy_Line_001
data.value: [tmp]Several rivers lead into Depleted Basin, but it never seems to fill up. Where does all that water go?

data.name: Strategy_Line_002
data.value: The Steel-type Pokemon in Copper Quarry shrugged off all our attacks.[br]We'll need to strategize.[pause=0]\nLet's consider what moves we can use...

data.name: Strategy_Line_003
data.value: [tmp]There's supposed to be a locked tower in Forsaken Desert, but it's only opened by switches.

data.name: Strategy_Line_004
data.value: [tmp]What do you want to do now?

data.name: Strategy_Rescued_Line_001
data.value: [tmp]I was so entranced by the markings on the walls that I was separated from you.

data.name: Strategy_Rescued_Line_002
data.value: [tmp]I'm just glad you're okay!

data.name: Strategy_Rescued_Line_003
data.value: [tmp]Here take this item as a reward.

data.name: Tutor_Accept
data.value: Alright, let's do it!

data.name: Tutor_Already
data.value: [tmp]You know what I'm talking about! You've learned this move too!

data.name: Tutor_Ask
data.value: [tmp]You! A {0}! You're the kind of Pokemon that'd get what I'm talking about![br]Want me to teach you {1}?

data.name: Tutor_Decline
data.value: Come back if you change your mind.

data.name: Tutor_Done
data.value: [tmp]There are other tutors wandering around in the dungeons.[br]They've spent ages training in dungeons without outside contact,[pause=0] but I'm sure they'd enjoy some company.

data.name: Tutor_Incompatible
data.value: [tmp]But the other townsfolk aren't interested in hearing about it.[br]If only there was someone I could share this knowledge with.

data.name: Tutor_Intro
data.value: [tmp]Through my adventures I've learned a special technique, known as {0}!

data.name: Tutor_Taught
data.value: [tmp]By the way...[pause=0]\nI learned this move from a traveling move tutor.[br]He said he'd pass by base town after I spoke to him.
